title: Force solid white (opaque) surfaces for dialogs, dropdowns, and selection menus

requirements.summary: Make all modal dialog panels fully opaque solid white (no transparency/blur) across the app, including all modal forms.
acceptanceCriteria: Every DialogContent panel in the app has an opaque solid white background (opacity 1) in both light and dark modes.
No dialog panel uses semi-transparent Tailwind classes (e.g., bg-*/xx), backdrop-blur, or CSS opacity less than 1.
Spot-check: AddMedicationModal DialogContent remains solid white (currently uses `dialog-solid-white`) and the same behavior is applied consistently to all other dialogs.

file_operations.description: Ensure the Profile Setup modal DialogContent explicitly uses the existing solid-white dialog class (e.g., add `dialog-solid-white`) so the panel background is fully opaque.
Update the Add ADL Record modal DialogContent to explicitly enforce a solid white, fully opaque background (align with `dialog-solid-white`).
Update the Add MAR Record modal DialogContent to explicitly enforce a solid white, fully opaque background (align with `dialog-solid-white`).
Update the Record Daily Vitals modal DialogContent to explicitly enforce a solid white, fully opaque background (align with `dialog-solid-white`).
Update the Edit Resident Information modal DialogContent to explicitly enforce a solid white, fully opaque background (align with `dialog-solid-white`).

requirements.summary: Make all dropdown menus and selection menus (Select/dropdown/popover-style) fully opaque solid white for the menu surface across the app.
acceptanceCriteria: All SelectContent / dropdown menu content surfaces are solid white (opacity 1) and readable, with no translucency.
No dropdown/select menu uses semi-transparent Tailwind classes (e.g., bg-*/xx) or backdrop blur for the menu surface.
Visual verification: opening a route selector (e.g., Administration Route) shows an opaque white menu background.

file_operations.description: Ensure Select menu surfaces used in Add Medication (e.g., Administration Route, Prescribing Physician) render with a fully opaque solid white menu background (prefer global safeguard + any explicit content class overrides where supported).

Ensure Select menu surfaces used in Edit Medication (e.g., Administration Route, Prescribing Physician) render with a fully opaque solid white menu background (prefer global safeguard + any explicit content class overrides where supported).

Ensure Select menu surfaces used in Add New Resident (Room Type, Bed, Code Status, etc.) render with a fully opaque solid white menu background (prefer global safeguard + any explicit content class overrides where supported).

Ensure Select menu surfaces used in Profile Setup (Role selector) render with a fully opaque solid white menu background (prefer global safeguard + any explicit content class overrides where supported).

requirements.summary: Add global styling safeguards to prevent any dialog/dropdown/select/popover surfaces from becoming transparent due to theme alpha/defaults, without editing `frontend/src/components/ui`.
acceptanceCriteria: No changes are made to files in `frontend/src/components/ui/*`.
Global CSS/theme adjustments prevent transparent popover/menu/dialog surfaces even if a consuming component forgets to pass an explicit solid background class.
After the change, inspecting computed styles for menu/dialog surfaces shows an opaque white background color (no alpha channel) and opacity 1.

file_operations.description: Add global CSS overrides that force Radix/shadcn overlay content surfaces (dialogs, popovers, dropdown menus, select menus) to use a solid white background with opacity 1 and no backdrop blur/filter on the surface itself; implement using resilient attribute-based selectors (e.g., targeting common Radix content nodes) and/or a reusable utility class, without modifying any files under `frontend/src/components/ui`.
